topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547fb24563687272e4070200#post_547fb24563687272e4070200
[bq="Twisty"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547fb1ff63687258f9240100#post_547fb1ff63687258f9240100
[bq="uc9"]I know people don't like it when I post touhou,[/bq]

i dont mind touhouposting
[/bq]
When touhou comes to the west if it's ever localized the one thing you'll never see is a horror movie of it because it's already as fucking dark as you can possibly make it without resorting to gore while on the surface being as cute as possible.


One of my favorite characters would have to be Byakuren; her back story in a nutshell:
People in the past, "Kill everyone who looks different cause that's what gods want you to do!  Murder them!  Leave no one left!  Kill the women!  Kill the children!  Kill the elderly!  Kill!  Kill!  Kill!"
Byakuren, "Idunno; helping them instead seems more profitable"
Youkai, "A human helping us?  I don't know how to respond; I've never received kindness from a human.  Thank you"
Byakuren, "I'm being kind for selfish reasons, but then again when you get down to it helping those in need is more important cause people are still people regardless of how they look"
Youkai, "Wow; so you're just like us when you get down to it"
Byakuren, "I help people regardless of how they look cause when you get down to it just cause someone looks different doesn't mean they are different"
People in the past, "NOPE!  You refused to commmit genocide so enjoy hell!"

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547fb5736368722fdf1b0000#post_547fb5736368722fdf1b0000
[bq="Carcass Strife"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547fb4d66368720ed91f0200#post_547fb4d66368720ed91f0200

It looks like her affection just got spirited away.
